title: Timeless Urban Villa with Architectural Heritage in Srodmiescie
description: This distinguished 6-bedroom house, offering 260 sqm of refined living space, is nestled in a picturesque corner of Katowice’s historic Srodmiescie district. The home gracefully combines period character with modern updates, featuring lofty ceilings, panoramic windows, a clever open-plan layout, and a stately exterior. Three elegant bathrooms support easy family life and entertaining, while the inclusion of a video intercom adds an extra measure of security. Private parking behind the house offers unmatched city convenience.
neighborhood_description: Set within Katowice's vibrant and central Srodmiescie area, the home is steps away from key business addresses, atmospheric cafés, and cultural hotspots. Excellent public transport and dedicated bike lines make daily commutes effortless, while nearby parks and playgrounds reveal relaxation opportunities amid urban energy. This unique blend creates a balanced environment ideal for work and leisure.
lifestyle_benefits: easy commute by public transport and bike
access to nearby parks and playgrounds
target_buyer: Ideal for established or aspiring entrepreneurs, professionals, or families seeking a residence with architectural soul, prioritizing easy access to the city’s business, culture, and green spaces.
market_positioning: A rare opportunity for business-savvy individuals seeking a high-profile, historic home in Katowice’s downtown market—offering character, space, security, and an unbeatable metropolitan location.
